input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Data Analytics Dashboard Loading Today

The data analytics dashboard was unable to load, which might be related to a MySQL database connection problem. I attempted to restart the MySQL server and verify the network connection, yet the issue remains unresolved You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. I would be grateful for prompt assistance in addressing this concern. My name is David Kim.
